name: Action Network Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Action Network Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Action Network API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Action Network API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: attendance

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add

personId.name: personId
personId.description: ID of the person to add the tag to
personId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person ID | 作用: ID of the person to add the tag to | (必填项)

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: ID of the event to retrieve
eventId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event ID | 作用: ID of the event to retrieve | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

attendanceId.name: attendanceId
attendanceId.description: ID of the attendance to retrieve
attendanceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attendance ID | 作用: ID of the attendance to retrieve | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

originSystem.name: originSystem
originSystem.natural_language_description: 参数名: Origin System | 作用: Source where the petition originated | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the petition to create
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the petition to create | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: comments (值: None) - Comments to leave when signing this petition

email_addresses.name: email_addresses
email_addresses.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email Address | 作用: Person’s email addresses | 默认值: {}

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: comments (值: None) - Comments to leave when signing this petition

petitionId.name: petitionId
petitionId.description: ID of the petition whose signature to update
petitionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Petition ID | 作用: ID of the petition whose signature to update | (必填项)

signatureId.name: signatureId
signatureId.description: ID of the signature to update
signatureId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Signature ID | 作用: ID of the signature to update | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the tag to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the tag to create | (必填项)

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: ID of the tag whose tagging to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Name or ID | 作用: ID of the tag whose tagging to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

taggingId.name: taggingId
taggingId.description: ID of the tagging to remove. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
taggingId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tagging Name or ID | 作用: ID of the tagging to remove. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
